title: Futa Bus – IT Infrastructure & Support System
description: IT support and infrastructure implementation across 200+ Futa Bus offices nationwide.
overview: Provided nationwide IT support for ticketing software, built and maintained hardware infrastructure, and contributed to CCTV monitoring systems.
role: IT Support – maintaining software, hardware, and surveillance systems across 200+ branches.
features: Deploying and managing office CCTV infrastructure
security: Local network configurations, access control via CCTV monitoring rooms
challenges: Ensuring stability across distributed offices with varying network conditions

title: Prozy – Real Estate Infrastructure & CRM System
description: IT infrastructure and support for CRM and real estate operation system at Prozy.
overview: Contributed to building IT infrastructure, call center systems, and inventory monitoring for Prozy's real estate digital platform.
role: IT Infrastructure Support – deployed and monitored systems, supported CRM infrastructure and internal tools.
features: Set up and managed inventory & monitoring systems
Deployed and maintained call center infrastructure
Collaborated with tech teams to ensure system uptime
security: Internal network configuration, monitoring alerts, and access control
challenges: Ensuring real-time monitoring and system reliability during fast company scale-up

title: Maersk Line – Logistics IT Infrastructure & Cyber Recovery
description: Network engineering, CRM enhancement, and cybersecurity response during Maersk’s global ransomware incident.
overview: Supported IT infrastructure, Salesforce CRM, and participated in global cyber recovery efforts after the ransomware attack on Maersk’s systems.
role: IT Support & Infrastructure Engineer – handled network restoration, SAP recovery, and post-attack system reconfiguration.
features: Network setup and hardening across regional offices
Supported SAP ERP and Salesforce CRM recovery
Coordinated system rebuilds after ransomware attack
Collaborated with global IT to ensure business continuity
security: Firewall reconfiguration, system patching, endpoint protection after NotPetya ransomware
challenges: Responding to and recovering from the global ransomware (NotPetya) attack that severely impacted Maersk's IT operations

title: Home Credit Vietnam – Collection & Mobile Communication System (MUCH)
description: Developed collection and workforce communication system (MUCH) to manage 500+ field agents, integrated with Loxon and Genesys solutions.
overview: Home Credit Vietnam pioneered the MUCH platform to optimize collection operations, unify communication, and monitor productivity of nationwide field agents.
role: Business Analyst – led system design, data structure planning, and coordinated implementation across departments.
features: Designed features: result submission, shift scheduling, routing, auto contract assignment, reconciliation
Structured the data model and collector tables in Oracle
Coordinated integration with Loxon and Genesys call center
Created diagrams and process flows using Astah
Traveled to Prague (Czech Republic) to present the solution to global teams
security: Internal access controls, audit trail for field submissions, secure integration with external systems
challenges: Standardizing field collection operations and scaling system to manage 500+ agents nationwide under real-time constraints

title: JACCS Vietnam – Credit Card System Integration
description: Integrated VISA, MasterCard, and 3D Secure protocols into JACCS credit card management system.
overview: JACCS Vietnam implemented a credit card platform with secure integration to VISA and MasterCard using 3D Secure authentication to enhance transaction protection.
role: Business Analyst – led integration requirement planning and collaborated with international payment gateway providers.
features: Collected and documented requirements for VISA & MasterCard 3D Secure integration
Analyzed existing card management workflows and designed integration blueprint
Supported SIT/UAT testing with banking and payment gateway teams
Defined exception handling, fraud monitoring, and fallback procedures
Worked with external stakeholders from Visa, Mastercard, and local banks
security: Compliance with PCI-DSS, 3D Secure authentication (ACS, MPI), and encrypted transaction flows
challenges: Ensuring strict compliance with international security standards and aligning JACCS infrastructure with global payment networks
